|brand = Cudy |model = WR1000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = August 7, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Cudy_WR1000_V1 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = WR1000 |fcc_id = 2APRGWR1000V1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 4285073C |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64JVSIQ; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:E0:4C, 70:79:38, B4:4B:D6 |oui = 00:E0:4C, 70:79:38, B4:4B:D6
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = JCG-XXXXXX-2.4G, JCG-XXXXXX-5G, Cudy-XXXX, Cudy-XXXX-5G |defaultssid_regex = ^Cudy-[A-F0-9}{4}$,,, ^Cudy-[A-F0-9]{4}-5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/06/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 731717225713 |ean = 6971690790011 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07FR6Q8XG |asin_country = DE |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = soldered |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612E;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = soldered |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The CPU ID is [[MediaTek]] MT7628A. The used speed is 580MHz. Works also with OpenWrt Image ''wl-wn575a3-squashfs-sysupgrade.bin''. Only the LEDs for WiFi do not work. {{See also|Winstars WS-WN535G3E|Winstars WS-WN535G3R}}
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/cudy/cudy_wr1000_v1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt76x8 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:WR1000 01.jpg| File:WR1000 02.jpg| File:WR1000 03.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::packaging| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Cudy-Wr1000-top.jpg|Top of board with soldered serial port File:Cudy-WR1000-bottom.jpg|Bottom of board with soldered serial port </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== :[http://www.cudytech.com/ProductInfoCategory?categoryId=52939 Wireless Smart Routers] *[[Cudy WR2600]] - AC2600 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Gigabit Router :● 4x4 802.11ac, 1733Mbps (5GHz) + 600Mbps (2.4GHz) :● Chipset: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A + MT7615N + MT7615N :● 5x GbE ports, 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, 4x antennas *[[Cudy WR2100]] - AC2100 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Gigabit Router *[[Cudy WR1300]] - AC1300 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Gigabit Router *[[Cudy WR1200]] - AC1200 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Cudy WR1000 V1]] - AC1200 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Cudy WR300]] - N300 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.cudytech.com/productinfo/512212.html PPage] *[[Cudy RE300 V1]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2APRGRE300V1 2APRGRE300V1] (2018-07-25) :OEM: [[Winstars WS-WN578]] (N2H) • [[Winstars WS-WN575A2]]
